# Utils

> Standard library generic mathematical utilities.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var utils = require( '@stdlib/math/utils' );
```

#### utils

Standard library generic mathematical utilities.

``` javascript
var o = utils;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
